conclusion: To find the charge Q carried by the capacitor after the circuit stabilizes.
The equivalent resistance R_{23} of resistors R_2 and R_3 in parallel is 2 Ω.
The total resistance R_{total} in the circuit is 6 Ω.
The current I in the circuit is 1 A.
The voltage across R_{23} is 2 V.
The voltage across the capacitor V_C is 2 V.
The charge Q on the capacitor is 20 μC.
The charge Q carried by the capacitor is 20 μC.
